```{r}
library(tidymodels)
library(GGally)
library(parsnip)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("dataset.csv")
```

# Random Forest

We will try to predict the HadHeartAttack variable using the other variables.

```{r}
set.seed(123)
df_split <- initial_split(na.omit(df), prop = 0.70, strata = HadHeartAttack)
df_train <- training(df_split)
df_test <- testing(df_split)
```

```{r}
rand_forest(mtry = 25) %>%
  set_engine("ranger", max.depth = 20) %>%
  set_mode("regression") %>%
  fit(HadHeartAttack ~ ., data = df)
```
